File naming conventions. If the Jupyter Notebook starts with:
- "S" --> supplementary materials
- "M" --> methods
- "R" --> results
- "D" --> discussion
- "E" --> extra
And the following number(s) corresponds to the paper element number.

Background maps are loaded as pickels to speed up the plotting. These pickles are created in the notebook "map-pickles.ipynb"

Files used for plotting are included in /analysis-code/files/ unless the file is from an external source, in which case the source is identified, or if the files are created by one of the other notebooks.
